summary: The disappearance of a princess coincides with the arrival of a prophetess who warns of the return of Godzilla, Rodan and the arrival of a civilization destroying space monster.
cast: Yôsuke Natsuki|Yuriko Hoshi|Hiroshi Koizumi|Akiko Wakabayashi|Emi Itô|Yumi Itô|Takashi Shimura|Akihiko Hirata|Hisaya Itô|Minoru Takada|Someshô Matsumoto|Ikio Sawamura|Kôzô Nomura|Kenji Sahara|Susumu Kurobe|Tôru Ibuki|Kazuo Suzuki|Haruya Katô|Shin Ôtomo|Senkichi Ômura|Yutaka Nakayama|Heihachirô Ôkawa|Yutaka Oka|Hideyo Amamoto|Yoshio Kosugi|Yoshifumi Tajima|Kôji Uno|Shigeki Ishida|Toshihiko Furuta|Kôtarô Tomita|Ichiya Aozora|Senya Aozora|Yuriko Hanabusa|Nakajirô Tomita|Hideo Shibuya|Haruo Nakajima|Shôichi Hirose|Masaki Shinohara|Katsumi Tezuka|Kôji Uruki|Kenzô Echigo|Bin Furuya|Yoshio Katsube|Toku Ihara|Kazuo Imai|Daisuke Inoue|Saburô Kadowaki|Keiichirô Katsumoto|Takuzô Kumagai|Jun Kuroki|Oshio Miura|Jun'ichirô Mukai|Haruya Sakamoto|Seiji Ikeda|Kenji Tsubono|Mitsuo Tsuda|Tamami Urayama|Shigeo Katô|Akio Kusama
title: Godzilla contra Ghidorah, el dragón de tres cabezas
